Text: Contact Info for Conference Call Tomorrow at am EDT Cc Paul and I are looking forward to our conference call tomorrow at am EDT I can be reached at Paul can be reached at Please let Kate and Theresa both copied on this message know whether we are to call a number or whether someone will be calling us tomorrow Thanks Howard Howard Kunreuther Cecilia Yen Koo Professor of Decisions Sciences and Public Policy Chairperson Operations and Information Management Department Steinberg HallDietrich Hall Wharton School University of Pennsylvania Philadelphia PA Phone FAX Email
Out of the officeam out of the office until June th and am unlikely to be checking email until then Please contact Kate Fang at or if you need to get in touch with me Thanks

RE Email addresses Cc Vince Paul and I are looking forward to working with you Joe Mark and Claudio on this project Howard Howard Kunreuther Cecilia Yen Koo Professor of Decisions Sciences and Public Policy Chairperson Operations and Information Management Department Steinberg HallDietrich Hall Wharton School University of Pennsylvania Philadelphia PA Phone FAX Email Original Message From Kaminski Vince J mailto Sent Tuesday June AM To Cc Kaminski Vince J Hrgovcic Joseph Tawney Mark Ribeiro Claudio Subject Email addresses Paul and Howard I am sending you as promised the Email addresses of the participants of the conference call on Friday Vince
